title: Mobile Microlearning-Based Math Job Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics and job-related mathematical knowledge
context.additional_context: A course targeting financial organization clerical workers to improve math problem-solving skills and develop work-applicable competencies in a mobile environment. Conducted in a BYOD setting.

learning_goals: Solve on-the-job mathematical problems with over 80% accuracy using mobile learning modules
Apply three or more mathematical approaches contextually through microlearning content
Apply training content to actual work tasks at least twice within 72 hours of mobile learning
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
